dialogue.name: Red
dialogue.text: Grandma! {intrigued} The forest smells of wildflowers today.

dialogue.name: Grandma
dialogue.text: Take care, my dear. {satisfied} Stick to the path and don't rush.

dialogue.name: Wolf
dialogue.text: What a lovely morning for a walk, isn't it? {sly}

dialogue.name: Red
dialogue.text: Hello, stranger. {cautious} Have you seen any mushrooms nearby?

dialogue.name: Wolf
dialogue.text: Mushrooms and shortcuts aplenty. {sly} I know a quicker way to your grandmother's.

dialogue.name: Red
dialogue.text: That's kind of you, but I mustn't stray. {firm}

dialogue.name: Wolf
dialogue.text: Of course, of course. {intrigued} Then perhaps I'll race you there â€” for fun.

dialogue.name: Red
dialogue.text: A race? {laughing} Very well, but no tricks!

dialogue.name: Wolf
dialogue.text: Tricks are for cards, not for me. {sly}

dialogue.name: Grandma
dialogue.text: Who's at the door? {concerned} Oh my, who's there?

dialogue.name: Red
dialogue.text: It's me, Grandma! {relieved} I've brought some bread and tea.

dialogue.name: Wolf
dialogue.text: How wholesome. {sly} Enjoy the company, little one.

dialogue.name: Woodcutter
dialogue.text: I heard a commotion in the woods. {brave} Is everyone alright?

dialogue.name: Red
dialogue.text: All is well now. {grateful} Thank you for checking on us.

dialogue.name: Wolf
dialogue.text: Farewell for now. {sly} The forest calls.
